meta-review.comment: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night is a blood-pumping, monster-crashing, Metroidvania adventure that brings back the nostalgic thrill of classic Castlevania games. With its seamless combat, captivating RPG elements, and sprawling map full of hidden secrets, Bloodstained invites players to obsessively explore every nook and cranny of its haunted castle. While the occasional load screen may briefly interrupt the action, it's a paltry price to pay for experiencing this near-masterwork. Whether you're a die-hard fan of the genre or a newcomer, Bloodstained offers a thrilling revival of the classic Igarashi Castlevania games, with just a few pesky design issues and performance hiccups holding it back. Morning has come to vanquish the terrible night, and Bloodstained shines brightly as a beacon for the new generation of Igavania. So grab your whip and get ready for a fang-tastic adventure!
